code: "use client";import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=()=>{const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(searchTerm.trim()){navigate(`/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(searchTerm)}`);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"search-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Buscar usuarios o publicaciones...",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value),className:"search-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"search-button",children:"Buscar"})]});};export default SearchBar;
